name: Furniture_of_America_Faite_Country_Style_Hallway_Chest
reviews: Definitely not the bright blue color as advertised. Mine was more of a dark mud blue with the bright blue painted as the back panel and underneath the bottom piece (ie. places that aren't visible). The quality is not bad for the price, it's a pretty sturdy piece that was packed well in the shipping boxes. One of the drawers isn't functional as a slide-out and it was a pain to put together. It took about 4 hours. I'm keeping it as it would be more of a pain to return. Although the color isn't true to the picture, it is not a bad looking piece and does look nice in my guest room.

I really like this chest that I purchased. It goes perfectly in our entry way. Doesn't look cheap and has pretty solid construction.It took awhile to put together, but hey, there area lots of parts.One of the rear corners came with a ding on it, but not enough to be too upset about. It is not on the front.Color may be a little darker than pictured, but it still works well.
Love the chest. It is actually darker than pictured which works better with my other furniture. However, it is a lot of work to assemble it and it came slightly damaged.

This hallway chest is beautiful and seems sturdy. Arrived in good condition. While the chest is great and is what I was looking for, can honestly say that if I knew how bad the instructions were I would have passed. I have put together many a furniture piece but this ranked as what as the most time consuming and frustrating due simply to the less than optimum instructions....in my opinion.But the chest is beautiful though.
it was very nice i love it
I am very satisfied with my purchase, it's just as beautiful as the description said, would highly recommend it.

As soon as I saw the photo online I knew I wanted this for our foyer. When it arrived in a flat box today, I was doubting my decision. Was I surprised!This is an extremely well made chest. Instructions could be a little rough for some inexperienced people but the construction of the chest and the ease as to which it goes together is stunning. I love it. Now, I am looking for more Furniture of America pieces. What an amazing find!
description:
Gracious slats inspired by Louver designs create a wonderfully
country style storage chest. The beautiful design is further
accentuated with the three finish options, allowing you to pair
this piece perfectly in any chosen setting. Set includes: One (1) chestMaterials: Solid wood, wood veneer and metalFinish options: Black, blue or vintage whiteWarming appeal with Louver-inspired slat doorsTwo (2) upper drawers with shaker style drawer facesStore large or small items atop the two (2) shelves within
  the cabinetFits in any entryway, hallway or bedroom with its appealing
  designDisplay decor or books atop the wide surfaceStore shoes, boxes, baskets and more within the cabinetSolid wood and veneer craftsmanship ensure durable
  designAll dimensions are approximateOverall dimensions: 34.13 inches high x 36 inches wide x 15
  inches deepStyleCountry, Rustic, VintageMaterialVeneer, WoodTypeAccent Tables, Chests, Console Tables, Sofa TablesFinishBlack Finish, Blue Finish, Cream FinishShapeRectangleAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack, Blue, Brown, Cream, Off-White
